description: A list of Amazon EC2 instances running on the Outpost and belonging to the account that initiated the capacity task. Use this list to specify the instances you cannot stop to free up capacity to run the capacity task.

parameters.name: OutpostIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the Outpost associated with the specified capacity task.

parameters.name: CapacityTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the capacity task.

nested_items.name: BlockingInstances
nested_items.description: A list of all running Amazon EC2 instances on the Outpost. Stopping one or more of these instances can free up the capacity needed to run the capacity task.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the blocking instance.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: AwsServiceName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service name that owns the specified blocking instance.
